mapper.select:
from contracted_field_detail cfd
and ( ( gcy.insurance_plan_id = 4 --Grain and exists ( select 1 from inventory_field invf left join inventory_seeded_grain isg on isg.inventory_field_guid = invf.inventory_field_guid left join declared_yield_field dyf on dyf.inventory_field_guid = invf.inventory_field_guid where invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = gcy.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id and ((isg.inventory_seeded_grain_guid is not null and isg.crop_commodity_id is not null and isg.seeded_acres > 0 ) or dyf.declared_yield_field_guid is not null ) ) ) or ( gcy.insurance_plan_id = 5 --Forage and exists ( select 1 from inventory_field invf left join inventory_seeded_forage isf on isf.inventory_field_guid = invf.inventory_field_guid left join declared_yield_field dyf on dyf.inventory_field_guid = invf.inventory_field_guid where invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = gcy.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id and ( isf.inventory_seeded_forage_guid is not null or dyf.declared_yield_field_guid is not null ) ) ) )

from contracted_field_detail cfd
and ( ( gcy.insurance_plan_id = 4 --Grain and exists ( select 1 from inventory_field invf join inventory_seeded_grain isg on isg.inventory_field_guid = invf.inventory_field_guid join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = isg.crop_commodity_id where invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = gcy.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id and cc.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id -- Exclude Forage commodities on Seeded Grain and isg.seeded_acres > 0 -- > 0 ) ) or ( gcy.insurance_plan_id = 5 --Forage and exists ( select 1 from inventory_field invf join inventory_seeded_forage isf on isf.inventory_field_guid = invf.inventory_field_guid join crop_variety v on v.crop_variety_id = isf.crop_variety_id where invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = gcy.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id ) ) )

select afd.annual_field_detail_id, afd.field_id, afd.crop_year, cfd.contracted_field_detail_id, gcy.grower_contract_year_id, ip.insurance_plan_id, ip.insurance_plan_name from annual_field_detail afd left join contracted_field_detail cfd on cfd.annual_field_detail_id = afd.annual_field_detail_id left join grower_contract_year gcy on gcy.grower_contract_year_id = cfd.grower_contract_year_id left join insurance_plan ip on ip.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id where afd.crop_year = #{cropYear} and afd.field_id = #{fieldId} and (gcy.insurance_plan_id is null or gcy.insurance_plan_id = #{insurancePlanId})
SELECT contracted_field_detail_id, display_order FROM contracted_field_detail WHERE grower_contract_year_id = #{growerContractYearId} ORDER by display_order ASC
